comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre

When you select two or more items from the download manager window, then action is triggered only for the last one.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Download two or more files
2. Select all of them from the download manager
3. Drag&Drop in a different folder
Actual Results:  
Only the last one is moved/copied/...


Tested on Windows 7, XP
comments.creator: fralos@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
Confirmed using Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre ID:20110303030406. Found no Dupe.

Didn't know this is possible at all. Seems to be dragable only with downloaded Files that stay in your specified Download Dir.
comments.creator: xtc4uall@gmail.com
